title: Lost skin?
body: I had either bought or got shadow Evelynn in a chest a while back, and now I no longer have the skin?!

replies.body: I went ahead and checked all over this account for you, but there isn't any history of Shadow Evelynn being on this account as a skin or even a skin shard. If you're thinking about a different account, shoot me that name and I can check up on it as well!

Oh that's weird, My other account is LHessL
It could be that I got it in a chest and then rr 'd it lol
Hmmmmmm not seeing it there either =\
That must be it then I re-rolled it :\
